connector.description: Receive data from AWS SQS subscribed to Eventbridge Bus reporting events related to an S3 bucket or multiple buckets.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.queueNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The SQS Queue Name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.autoCreateQueue
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: Setting the autocreation of the SQS queue.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.amazonAWSHost
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The hostname of the Amazon AWS cloud.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.protocol
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The underlying protocol used to communicate with SQS Example: http or https

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.queueURL
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The full SQS Queue URL (required if using KEDA)

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.delay
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll of the selected stream

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.greedy
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: If greedy is enabled, then the polling will happen immediately again, if the previous run polled 1 or more messages.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source.getObject
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-event-based-source..description: If getObject is enabled, then the file created in the bucket will be get and returned as body, if not only the event will returned as body.
